scripts.bundleAndroid: npm run androidCommon:bundle && npm run androidAppA:bundle && npm run androidAppB:bundle
scripts.androidCommon:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/views/common/index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.common.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --config metro.common.config.js --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.common.bundle.map
scripts.androidAppA:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/views/appA/index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.appA.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --config metro.bundle.config.js --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.appA.bundle.map
scripts.androidAppB:bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/views/appB/index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.appB.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --config metro.bundle.config.js --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.appB.bundle.map
